author: rwesten
msg: 2nd attempt to changed the package "constraintEncoders" to its lower case version - seams not so easy on a file system that does not allow multiple files/directories that only differ in lower/upper case letters ...

author: bimargulies
msg: Initial reaction to release of XmlSchema 2.0.

author: rwesten
msg: Fixes STANBOL-89 and improves the documentation provided for the default configuration of Solr Server used together with the SolrYard implementation
- The IndexDataTypeEnum now allows to specify if a data type is interpreted natural language texts.
- This property is enabled for TXT (entityhub:Text) and STR (xsd:string)
- The encodeLangeuage(..) methods of the SolrFieldMapper do no longer add the "_!@" field to the encoding
- The SolrFieldMapper does now add the "_!@" field for all values with a datatype that has the  natural language property set to true
- The language constraint encoder does no longer add the "str" data type field when encoding lanugage constraints.
- changed the location of the README.txt explaining the default configuration to the root folder.
- The "schema.xml" of the default configuration now contains detailed descriptions about how to change/optimise it without breaking assumptions made by the SolrYard implementation.
- updated the documentation of the solr.xml (multi core configuration)
- Changed remaining occurrences of "rick" to "entityhub" within the default configuration
- changed the package "constraintEncoders" to its lower case version
